title: Did ‘Yardi Gras’ Replace Mardi Gras Parades in New Orleans?
subtitle: New Orleans residents marked the holiday a little differently in 2021 due to the coronavirus pandemic.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Mardi Gras parades were canceled in 2021 to limit the spread of COVID-19. Instead, some people decorated their houses like parade floats in a trend that some called “Yardi Gras.”
